description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Los Angeles, United States. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Stylish Hollywood Glamour Near Walk of Fame with Rooftop Pool and Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Experience Hollywood's glitz and glamour with an escape in the heart of Tinseltown. Ideal for first-time travellers, Dream Hollywood is located along the palm-lined streets of Los Angeles, placing you a stone's throw from the famous Hollywood Walk of Fame and the historic TCL Chinese Theatre. Take in sweeping views of the Hollywood Hills from the city's swishest rooftop pool, and enjoy a convenient grab-and-go breakfast at Turntable Bar to make your mornings effortless. Use this central retreat as your launchpad to discover the star-studded neighbourhoods of Los Angeles -- Hollywood Boulevard and the boutique of Melrose Avenue are just a short stroll, while the trendy neighbourhoods of Beverley Hills and Santa Monica are a short drive away.

hotels.title: Sophisticated West Hollywood Suites with Daily Breakfast, Daily US$25 Dining Credit & Parking
hotels.description: Rock star vibes meet Beverly Hills glam at this all-suite sanctuary where music legends have kicked back and A-listers call home. With 133 oversized suites, a sun-soaked rooftop pool scene and tennis courts that have seen more celebrity serves than Wimbledon, this place walks the walk. Experience LA’s playground for the rich and famous - tucked away in one of the most glamorous enclaves, down a tree-lined street perfectly poised between Beverly Hills and West Hollywood. Savour a morning coffee at Montrose Market or enjoy a handcrafted drink at Tonic rooftop bar after a day of exploring. This stylish hideaway is where Hollywood's energy comes alive, whispering exclusivity but shouting luxury.

hotels.title: Convenient LAX Airport Stay with Four Onsite Restaurants & Complimentary Airport Shuttle
hotels.description: Discover the perfect balance of convenience and comfort at Sonesta Los Angeles Airport LAX, located just minutes from Los Angeles International Airport. This modern and stylish hotel is the perfect stopover for long-haul travellers or those catching late-night or early-morning flights. Enjoy a blissful night's rest in the comfort of your spacious room, before enjoying a dip in the heated swimming pool or tasting your way through Southern California at one of the hotel's four on-site restaurants.

hotels.title: Vibrant West Hollywood Beauty with Sunset Strip Views, Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Experience spectacular Hollywood glamour and laid-back Californian comfort in the beating heart of LA at Pendry West Hollywood. Set in the Hollywood Hills, this hotel is as vibrant and exciting as the town itself, the historical home of a thriving film, music and art scene. Taking a refreshing approach to luxury, the Pendry invites guests to find rest and rejuvenation in its sleek modern interiors, variety of fine dining and entertainment options, and an impressive rooftop pool and bar.

hotels.title: Trendy West Hollywood Retreat with Rooftop Bar, Pool & Restaurant
hotels.description: Dive headfirst into the glitz and glamour of Hollywood with a stay at this chic urban retreat located in the heart of West Hollywood's design district. Satisfy your palate at the hotel's acclaimed restaurant, Knoll, offering farm-to-table Californian cuisine, or unwind with a refreshing cocktail on the stylish rooftop beside the sparkling pool. Between games of tennis or pickleball on the rooftop courts, explore the city's star-studded attractions, dining hot spots and shopping at The Grove with ease, just a short walk or drive away.

hotels.title: Glamorous West Hollywood Suites & Residences near Sunset Boulevard with Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Soak up the glitz and glam of West Hollywood with a luxurious stay in this stylish retreat, nestled in the pulsating heart of Los Angeles' most famous neighbourhood. Enjoy a slice of the high life at the rooftop terrace where you can soak up city views from a private cabana, take a dip in the alluring pool or sip on refreshing tipples from the always-buzzing poolside bar. Reflecting old Hollywood elegance, unwind in tastefully appointed suites and residences or indulge in atmospheric dining at The Fitting Room, offering a chef-driven menu with American, Hispanic and Asian influences. When you're ready to explore, Sunset Strip's vibrant nightlife, Rodeo Drive's world-class shopping and the iconic Hollywood Walk of Fame are just a short stroll away.

hotels.title: Downtown Los Angeles Glamour near LA Live with Trendy Restaurant, Rooftop Pool & Top-Floor Bar
hotels.description: Capturing the essence of Hollywood's golden-era glamour, Hotel Indigo Los Angeles Downtown, an IHG Hotel is the ultimate boutique-style escape. This stylish hotel is just steps from some of LAs hottest entertainment hubs, including LA Live, the Grammy Museum and the Crypto.com Arena. Savour innovative Californian cuisine at Metropole Bar + Kitchen, soak up panoramic city views and artisanal cocktails at 18 Social or take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool.

hotels.title: Los Angeles Art Deco Escape on Sunset Strip with Rooftop Pool & Bar
hotels.description: Live the high life in the heart of Tinseltown with a stay at the gorgeous Sunset Tower Hotel in West Hollywood. Standing tall on the iconic Sunset Strip, this Art Deco beauty is celebrated for its heritage charm and modern luxuries. After days spent star-spotting, take yourself to The Tower Bar and Restaurant for an elegant, Old Hollywood-inspired meal and indulge in a poolside cocktail at the rooftop Terrace Bar.

hotels.vendor_name: Sofitel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills
hotels.title: Elegant Los Angeles City Break in Beverly Hills with Onsite Spa & Beauty Salon
hotels.description: Experience the allure of the City of Angels from the comfort of this ultra-chic Sofitel stay. Perfectly positioned at the crossroads of Beverly Hills and West Hollywood, Sofitel Los Angeles at Beverly Hills offers easy access to the world-renowned Rodeo Drive and The Grove shopping centre. Savour French-inspired Californian cuisine at the hotel's restaurant, Estérel, or sip on a cocktail at Riviera 31 Lounge Bar. For those seeking a wellness experience, the hotel boasts a state-of-the-art fitness centre and the tranquil Vendome Clinique Spa, offering a range of rejuvenating treatments. Art enthusiasts will appreciate the hotel's unique art collection, featuring works from local and international artists. When it's time to cool off, the sparkling pool is the perfect way to escape the Californian heat.

hotels.vendor_name: Kimpton Hotel Palomar Los Angeles Beverly Hills
hotels.title: Boutique LA Escape in Sophisticated Beverly Hills
hotels.description: Experience pure LA luxury at the Kimpton Hotel Palomar Beverley Hills, a captivating blend of modern sophistication and timeless elegance. Stylish rooms and suites and personalised service welcome guests home after unforgettable adventures. Dive into the refreshing pool, work up a sweat in the fitness centre or take yourself out for coffee, cocktails and California comfort food at the hotel's dining hotspot, Double Take.

hotels.title: Trendy Los Angeles Stay Along Sunset Strip with Live Music, Pizza Restaurant & Pool
hotels.description: Experience the pulsating energy of L.A.'s famed Sunset Strip with a stay at this hotspot for music lovers. Boasting its own music venue, Backbeat, live performances from emerging and established local artists set the rhythm of your stay. The hotel's poolside scene is equally enticing, with live DJ sets and a buzzing restaurant, B-Side, serving up pizza and pints. For those seeking a workout, the fitness centre is at your disposal, while the Shred Shed awaits when musical creativity strikes.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Los Angeles Glamour near Hollywood Walk of Fame with Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: New heights of sun-kissed Los Angeles luxury await with a stay at Kimpton Everly Hotel, an IHG Hotel, an establishment blending timeless allure and showstopping views of Hollywood Hills to provide an escape in the heart of it all. After days spent exploring the Hollywood Walk of Fame and nearby Universal Studios, return to market-inspired, oven-fired plates at Jane Q or head to the hotel’s rooftop pool for moments of quiet repose surrounded by the glitz and glam of the city of stars.

hotels.title: Glamourous Los Angeles City Break with Rooftop Pool & Bar Overlooking the Hollywood Sign
hotels.description: Discover Tinseltown with a stay at The Godfrey Hotel Hollywood, boasting a trendy rooftop bar and pool overlooking the world-famous Hollywood Sign and minutes from the Sunset Strip. Soak up the glitzy interior designed and curated arts program, as well as a convenient location in the heart of this showbiz-loving city. Fill your days with hiking, shopping, and sightseeing around Los Angeles, and your evenings lounging high above the sparkling lights.

hotels.vendor_name: Omni Los Angeles at California Plaza
hotels.title: Glamorous Los Angeles Stay Near Universal Studios with Heated Outdoor Pool & Thee Onsite Dining Venues
hotels.description: Experience the vibrancy of Los Angeles with a stay at this modern downtown gem. You'll be perfectly positioned for exploring the city's cultural and culinary delights, with The Museum of Contemporary Art, Walt Disney Concert Hall and Grand Central Market less than a 10-minute walk away. After a day of sightseeing, return to the hotel's two sophisticated restaurants: savour seasonal Californian plates at Noé Restaurant and Bar or enjoy a delicious brunch at Grand Café. For fitness enthusiasts, there's a state-of-the-art gym onsite and a heated lap pool offering panoramic city views.

seo.title: Hôtels à Los Angeles - États-Unis Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Los Angeles, United States avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
